column4: hay, I am trying to install nvidia driver on my ubuntu 12.04 and I'm having huge problems...

i install nvidia-current, and when i type nvidia-settings it says:"You do not appear to be using the NVIDIA X driver.  Please edit your X configuration file (just run `nvidia-xconfig` as root), and restart the X server."
did you install the driver while in x? you might need to log out and log back in
did you install the driver while in x? you might need to log out and log back in
